# @magicuidesign/mcp [![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/@magicuidesign%2Fmcp.svg?icon=si%3Anpm)](https://badge.fury.io/js/@magicuidesign%2Fmcp) Official ModelContextProtocol (MCP) server for [Magic UI](https://magicui.design/).
## Install MCP configuration ```bash npx @magicuidesign/cli@latest install ``` ### Supported Clients - [x] cursor - [x] windsurf - [x] claude - [x] cline - [x] roo-cline ## Manual Installation Add to your IDE's MCP config: ```json { "mcpServers": { "@magicuidesign/mcp": { "command": "npx", "args": ["-y", "@magicuidesign/mcp@latest"] } } } ``` ## Example Usage Once configured, you can questions like: > "Make a marquee of logos" > "Add a blur fade text animation" > "Add a grid background" ## Available Tools The server provides the following tools callable via MCP: | Tool Name | Description | |-----------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
